title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations

For Task A1, the response must describe the foundation of the authority of the DEA to carry out the Prescription Drug Marketing Act.

For Task A2, the response must explain how the president could affect the powers of the DEA.

For Task B, the response must explain how Congressional oversight of the DEA in this scenario reflects the principle of checks and balances.

For Task C1, the response must describe what the Supreme Court could do if a case with a question about the Prescription Drug Marketing Act came before the Court.

For Task C2, the response must explain how the actions of the Court could impact the ability of the DEA to carry out its efforts to eliminate drug trafficking and distribution.
